languages.text: Наскоро помянув погибших, разведчики погрузились на челнок. Но молебен принес мало утешения, ведь все, что они хотели — скорее убраться со страшного корабля.

After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.
languages.original_text: Наскоро помянув погибших, разведчики погрузились на челнок. Но молебен принес мало утешения, ведь все, что они хотели — скорее убраться со страшного корабля.

traits.locale_text: After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

languages.text: Tras una breve plegaria por los difuntos, los exploradores entraron en tromba a la lanzadera. Sin embargo, las palabras fueron parco consuelo, ya que los vivos solo querían abandonar esa nave aterradora cuanto antes.
languages.original_text: After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

traits.locale_text: Tras una breve plegaria por los difuntos, los exploradores entraron en tromba a la lanzadera. Sin embargo, las palabras fueron parco consuelo, ya que los vivos solo querían abandonar esa nave aterradora cuanto antes.

languages.text: 众人草草地追悼了死者之后，便一拥而上，挤进了穿梭机。大家的祈祷并没有带来任何慰藉，因为对活着的人而言，他们唯一想做的事情，就是尽快离开这艘恐怖的飞船。
languages.original_text: After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

traits.locale_text: 众人草草地追悼了死者之后，便一拥而上，挤进了穿梭机。大家的祈祷并没有带来任何慰藉，因为对活着的人而言，他们唯一想做的事情，就是尽快离开这艘恐怖的飞船。

languages.text: 偵察兵達は死者にテキパキと祈りをささげた後、シャトルに乗り込んだ。しかし、その口からはほとんど慰めの言葉は出てこない。生き残ったものの唯一の望みは、この恐ろしい船からできるだけ早く出発することだからである。
languages.original_text: After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

traits.locale_text: 偵察兵達は死者にテキパキと祈りをささげた後、シャトルに乗り込んだ。しかし、その口からはほとんど慰めの言葉は出てこない。生き残ったものの唯一の望みは、この恐ろしい船からできるだけ早く出発することだからである。

languages.text: Nach einem kurzen Gebet für die Toten drängten die Späher in das Shuttle. Aber die Worte brachten kaum Trost, denn die Lebenden hatten nur einen Wunsch: das schreckliche Schiff so schnell wie möglich zu verlassen.
languages.original_text: After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

traits.locale_text: Nach einem kurzen Gebet für die Toten drängten die Späher in das Shuttle. Aber die Worte brachten kaum Trost, denn die Lebenden hatten nur einen Wunsch: das schreckliche Schiff so schnell wie möglich zu verlassen.

languages.text: Les éclaireurs s'entassèrent dans la navette après avoir offert une brève prière aux morts. Ces mots ne leur apportèrent guère de réconfort, cependant, car ils désiraient uniquement quitter ce vaisseau de cauchemar le plus vite possible.
languages.original_text: After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

traits.locale_text: Les éclaireurs s'entassèrent dans la navette après avoir offert une brève prière aux morts. Ces mots ne leur apportèrent guère de réconfort, cependant, car ils désiraient uniquement quitter ce vaisseau de cauchemar le plus vite possible.

languages.text: Birimler, ölüler için hızlıca dua edip mekiğe doluştu. Kelimelerin kiyafetsiz kaldığı bu anda hâlâ sağ olanların tek temennisi, bir an önce bu gemiyi terk etmekti.
languages.original_text: After offering up a brisk prayer for the dead, the scouts piled into the shuttle. But the words brought little comfort, for the only thing the living wanted was to depart the terrifying ship as fast as possible.

traits.locale_text: Ölüler için hızlıca dua eden birimler mekiğe doluştu. Hayatta kalanların tek temennisi, bir an önce bu gemiyi terk etmekti ve kelimeler kifayetsiz kalıyordu.
